mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_NO , I.PRODUCT_NO , P.NAME PRODUCT_NAME , I.INVENTORY_NO , C.COLOR_NO , C.NAME COLOR_NAME , PS.SIZE_NO , PS.NAME SIZE_NAME , P.PRICE , PI.FILENAME THUMBNAIL_FILENAME , C.QUANTITY , C.CREATED_DATE , C.MEMBER_NO FROM CART C JOIN INVENTORY I ON C.INVENTORY_NO = I.INVENTORY_NO JOIN PRODUCT P ON I.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO JOIN COLOR C ON I.COLOR_NO = C.COLOR_NO JOIN PRODUCT_SIZE PS ON I.SIZE_NO = PS.SIZE_NO JOIN PRODUCT_IMG PI ON P.PRODUCT_NO = PI.PRODUCT_NO AND PI.THUMBNAIL_YN = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY C.CREATED_DATE DESC
